catalog.title: You can't miss this webinar
catalog.description: Join us for our PowerPlatform webinar and discover, alongside Leonardo Riofrio, our CTO, how to automate tasks, connect data, and create solutions without the hassle. üöÄ An experience designed to simplify your processes and save you time!

catalog.title: Delivering tech expertise and transformative solutions for your business.
catalog.description: Solutions Beyond Code

data.name: what we do
data.description:
At MushroomSoft, we specialize in providing cutting-edge solutions that drive businesses forward. Our true distinction lies in our ability to harness the potential of advanced technologies.

Whether it's the agility of Node.js, the robustness of Angular, the efficiency of Nx, or the transformative power of DevOps, we are fully equipped to tackle any challenge and deliver exceptional results.

catalog.name: Software Development
catalog.description: We offer customized software development solutions tailored to meet your business's specific needs, utilizing the latest technologies and agile methodologies.

catalog.name: Technological Resource Outsourcing
catalog.description: We offer customized software development solutions tailored to meet your business's specific needs, utilizing the latest technologies and agile methodologies.

catalog.name: Cloud
catalog.description: We implement and manage cloud solutions that guarantee scalability, security, and availability, optimizing the performance of your applications and data.

catalog.name: DevOps/MLops
catalog.description: We integrate DevOps and MLops practices to automate and optimize the software development lifecycle and machine learning models, accelerating value delivery.

catalog.name: Artificial Intelligence and Data Analysis
catalog.description: We develop and implement AI and data analysis solutions that provide valuable insights and enhance decision-making in your business.

catalog.name: Low-Code/No-Code
catalog.description: We offer low-code/no-code development platforms that enable rapid and efficient application creation, reducing development time and cost.

catalog.name: who we are
catalog.description:
At Mushroomsoft IT, we‚Äôre not just a software company‚Äîwe‚Äôre pioneers in cutting-edge technologies and high-performance teams. Our focus is on innovation, crafting solutions that meet today‚Äôs needs and anticipate future challenges.

Our dynamic team of developers drives our success, embracing creativity and excellence. We empower them to push boundaries and utilize the latest advancements to bring clients' visions to life.

Join us as we shape the future of technology, one breakthrough at a time.

catalog.name: our story
catalog.description:
In 2019, Jamil and Leonardo saw an opportunity to develop products in Ecuador and offer outsourcing to the U.S. They launched a pilot project with two FullStack developers, delivering the product in December. By March 2020, their quality led to new projects and a growing team.

The 2020 pandemic allowed them to hire remote talent, overcoming language and coordination challenges. Today, MushroomSoft thrives as a close-knit team, driven by excellence and innovation. Each year, we set new goals, committed to growth and making a difference.
